name: Rakuda Laughs
nutshell:
Aka Rakuda ga Warau

The series includes:

- Rakuda Laughs (Manga Action Lab, 1994)
- Dance with Rakuda (Comic Gekiman Vol.5, 1996)
- Rakuda Sings (Comic Gekiman Vol.6, 1998)
Rakuda to Warae:
- Laugh with Rakuda (Comic Ryu Vol.44, 2010)
- Laugh with Rakuda THE LAST (Comic Ryu Vol.45, 2010)

name: Donkikko
nutshell:
(from ebookjapan):
Donkikko is a boy who came to Tokyo for a reason. He is accompanied by Dondon, a boy whose power increases when he eats, and Gombe, a talking duck. The group aims to visit an antique dealer called "Wan Wan Do. However, they are turned away at the door because they have no connection to the place. Donkikko and his friends are in trouble, but they find a vacant lot. They build a house without permission. Then, the landowner discovers them and ......?　Donkikko, a boy with mysterious powers, causes a number of comedies that are unparalleled in their poignancy.

name: Mune ga Naru no wa  Kimi no Sei
nutshell: We were sharing the same feelings but he didn't realize it at all. Even though, I love him. That's what I have always thought for these past two years…

name: The Complete Works of Nekojiru
nutshell: Short stories about two white cats who have no respect for others and are just plain cruel. Dark humor warning.

name: Face With Love, Affection, and Time
nutshell: "You were originally the heartless one. The one who wanted to leave was you, and now you say you love me?!" Liang Zijin pulled Luo Xiangdong's shirt: "Since you came I won't miss it a second time." Luo Xiangdong turned the situation around, and kissed Liang Zijin: "Lian Zijin, you can't run away from me in this life."

name: Gentle Hearted Bad Guy Yoshio-Kun
nutshell:
He's a really nice guy! No, really! (Translated with author permission)
One page. That's all, go home.

name: I Don't Understand High School Girls
Chase the Dragon
nutshell:
The half wolf Daniel Winter, runs away from his lover A high ranking Dragon, a day after his proposal, However, after an year Ian finds him. "How did you find me? … Are you angry?" "What if I am angry? Are you serious?" ? " But now that I've found you, everything will change. running away, chasing, kidnapping, passion.
El medio lobo Daniel Winter. Se escapa de su amante Un Dragón de alto rango Ian Summers, Pero un día luego de casi un año finalmente lo encuentra. "¿Cómo me encontraste?… ¿Estás enojado?" "¿Que si estoy enojado? ¿Hablas en serio? “No estoy enojado, estoy furioso mi amante escapó al día siguiente luego de Comprometernos y se ha escondido constantemente. ¿Quién no estaría molesto luego de buscar a su amante por más de un año?" Pero ahora que te he encontrado todo cambiará. Huir, persecución, secuestro, pasión.

name: I Was Shaved Down There... For Medical Reasons!
nutshell: "You're half hard... I'll jerk you off." My childhood friend shaved me there! It's an extension of medical practice, but... I unintentionally reacted...!?

name: Life is Colorful
tags: Official Colored,Psychological,Long Strip,User Created,Fantasy,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Mystery
nutshell: A girl named Sayuri whose life fill with darkness after her parents died, there's no shade of colors in her life, she loses all hopes and dreams. Can she find those colors now?

name: Memeshii Aku to Azatoi Suh
nutshell: Zutto Kimi no Turn (Spin-Off)

name: Gallantly, Softly
nutshell:
Yuma is having trouble warding off perverts every morning on her way to school. Her classmate Suwa starts going to school with her, in order to protect her, and the two become a couple. However, Yuma is also interested in her biology teacher who rides the same train as her every morning, and…
The series is composed of coherent episodes that feature different characters.


Won the 33rd Kodansha Manga Award for Shojo in 2009

name: Hanakui
nutshell:
Celebrating her 30th year in the industry, the romantic comedy queen is back with a collection of charming one shots!
Office lady Tsushima harbors certain feelings she cannot tell anyone. In time, to swallow the words that she is not allowed to say, she starts eating pretty flowers!
Also included in this volume: Pillow Talk, The Pearl Necklace, Dark or White?, Love Agent, Flower Eater, Christmas Comes This Year as Well

name: Boys' Kingdom
nutshell: Himeno transferred to a former boys' school, Hallelujah. The president of the students association, Gao is an extreme misogynist, and the relationship between the two becomes intense.

name: The Flawless Childhood Friend Who Acts Spoiled When No One’s Looking
Kanojo wa mou Shinde Irunoni
nutshell: A world where androids and humans co-exist, Aka Okachimachi was abandoned by his parents because he "A Helper-roid was more useful than him", he needed a job in order to live, due to some circumstances he was offered the job of being a caretaker for a large apartment building with some apparently peculiar tenants.

name: R402
nutshell: “R“ or rather Room 402 is the room where our illustrious female main character lives. One day which seems to be by mere coincidence her fate intertwines with that of Sasamoto, a savvy man who seems to be down in the dumps. That is until he picks up a trinket which fell from her nether regions. Prepare yourself for a story of sexual psychological horror as Sasamoto enters into a brave new world.

name: Touhou/Gravity Falls - Illusion Falls 「Fantastic Momentary Tour」 (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
Find the author on:
Twitter | Facebook | Pixiv | Instagram

name: Hoshoku-sha Kisumi-kun
nutshell:
From Renta!:
Yasuharu has all that it takes to be very popular. His only fault is loving his childhood friend Yuma way too much. Every time Yuma says his pet phrase, "I wanna die," he replies smilingly, "I'll eat you, then," creeping his friend out. But, one day Yuma says something that triggers a change in their relationship…! A stolen kiss, a daring request, forced cohabitation… the exciting story of a possessive love!

name: Kyou no Yuiko-san
nutshell:
The story of the protagonist, Tomoya, and his everyday life with his girlfriend Yuiko-san.
Pt/Br:
||A história do protagonista, Tomoya, e sua vida cotidiana com sua namorada Yuiko-san.||

name: Rozen Maiden - Dolls Talk
nutshell: A spin-off of the Rozen Maiden series.

name: Labyrinthine Legend: Pulverize 'Em, Zack!
nutshell: Follow the adventures of Zack, a crazy boy with even crazier strength who loves to fight! What starts out as an innocent boxing match soon leads Zack into the world of invincible demon-possessed teenagers, acid-spewing mutants, and craven, bloodthirsty cultists! If you're looking for a manga that just bleeds insanity, then you've found it!

name: The Kiss of My Subordinate Who Looks Like My Fave Makes Me Weak in the Knees ~ Drenched on Top of the Desk
nutshell: "So sexy... You're drenched." Her subordinate touches her deepest spots with his hot tongue and gentle fingers... This is the story of Iori, a capable office lady whose team trusts her at work. But she actually loves reading manga and playing dating sims! One day, she meets Miyoshi, a new employee at her job that she gets placed in charge of training... the only problem is that he looks exactly like her favorite game character!! She can't stop fantasizing about situations like in her game happening... to the point that she has a dream about passionately kissing her favourite. "You're so sexy..." His sweet voice resounds, makig her wake up to Miyoshi pushing her down to the bed...!!?

name: Wonted
nutshell:
There are three different types of people in this world:
Those that are born ordinary,
Those that were born ordinary but can change,
And those who are born with special powers…
The first season is about the past of the two main characters.
The second season - Wonted: Cacophony - is the official 'Wonted' set six years later.
The third season is - Wonted: Noise
The final season is - Wonted: Scared

name: Led Along by the Landmine-Type Nursery Teacher
tags: Romance,Office Workers,School Life,Web Comic,Slice of Life
nutshell: Note: Jirai-kei (Literally "landmine-type") refers to a fashion style based on "landmine women" that have a high tendency to have violent emotional breakdowns.

name: Lip ni Shadow
nutshell: Childhood friends Nagi and Chikage live in the same company-owned housing. Just what is the "love magic" that Chikage uses to cure Nagi's sadness?

name: Moonlight Hair
nutshell: The year is 1850. A child with skin and hair as white as the moonlight is born in a Sioux Indian village. Despite the villagers' opposition, the Chieftain decides to keep the child…

name: A Record of a Mortal's Journey to Immortality
nutshell:
A poor and ordinary boy from a village joins a minor sect in Jiang Hu and becomes an Unofficial Disciple by chance. How will Han Li, a commoner by birth, establish a foothold for himself in in his sect? With his mediocre aptitude, he must successfully traverse the treacherous path of cultivation and avoid the notice of those who may do him harm. This is a story of an ordinary mortal who, against all odds, clashes with devilish demons and ancient celestials in order to find his own path towards immortality.

Links:

English Novel

name: Dantalian no Shoka - Dalian Days
nutshell: Dalian takes advantage of calm that came after the events of The Mystic Archives of Dantalian to integrate a school and make new friends. For the girl with thousands of years of existence and a strong character, it is quite another challenge it faces now!
